TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EditorZone extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase

summary.span: 用作 Web 部件控件集内的主控件，用于在网页中承载 控件。

span.span: Serves as the primary control in the Web Parts control set for hosting controls on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Web 部件控件集内，区域是包含网页上已定义区域并包含服务器控件的复合控件。Within the Web Parts control set, a zone is a composite control that covers a defined region on a Web page and contains server controls. 区域的主要功能是布局其包含的控件，并为这些控件提供 (UI) 的通用用户界面。The primary functions of a zone are to lay out the controls it contains, and to provide a common user interface (UI) for those controls. 有关区域及其在 Web 部件应用程序中的使用方式的一般信息，请参阅基类的参考文档 和[Web 部件控件集概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/k3w2y2tf(v=vs.100))。For general information about zones and how they are used in Web Parts applications, see the reference documentation for the base class, and [Web Parts Control Set Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/k3w2y2tf(v=vs.100)). 控件是 Web 部件控件集中的一项基本控件。The control is one of the fundamental controls in the Web Parts control set. Web 部件的一项重要功能是，最终用户可以根据自己的偏好修改 (或个性化) 网页，并保存其个性化设置以供将来浏览器会话使用。A key feature of Web Parts is the ability of end users to modify (or personalize) Web pages according to their preferences, and save their personalized settings for future browser sessions. 修改 Web 部件页面的一个方面包括编辑;用户可以编辑可见控件的外观、布局、行为和其他属性 。One aspect of modifying Web Parts pages includes editing; users can edit the appearance, layout, behavior, and other properties of the visible controls. Web 部件控件集中的多个控件提供编辑功能，包括 控件。Several controls in the Web Parts control set provide the editing features, including the control. 当 Web 部件页面进入编辑模式时，控件将变为可见，并使可 用于对控件进行个性化设置的各种控件 。An control becomes visible when a Web Parts page enters edit mode, and it makes available various controls that can be used to personalize controls. 控件与它的父级（类）非常相似， 但有一个重要区别： 控件提供了一个区域模板，该模板在其属性中引用 。The control is very similar to its parent, the class, with one key difference: The control provides a zone template, referenced in its property. 区域模板添加了以页持久性格式声明内容的功能。The zone template adds the ability to declare content in the page persistence format. 页面开发人员可以 在网页的声明性标记中放置控件，添加一个子 `` 元素，并在元素中 `` 添加对控件的声明性引用 。Page developers can place an control in the declarative markup of a Web page, add a child `` element, and within the `` element, add declarative references to controls. 该 控件还具有一个方法， 该方法重写类中的基方法 。The control also has a method, , which overrides a base method in the class. 此方法是必需的，以便 控件可以创建区域模板以包含以 声明方式添加到区域的任何控件。This method is necessary so that an control can create the zone template to contain any controls that are added to the zone declaratively. > [!NOTE] > UI 中的按钮 需要客户端脚本才能正常工作。The buttons in the UI require client-side scripting in order to work correctly. 如果在浏览器中禁用了脚本，则用户将无法通过 UI 执行操作 。If scripting is disabled in the browser, the user will not be able to perform actions through the UI. ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下，为此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准，例如 Web 内容可访问性准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级1指导原则。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 有关此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了类的几个声明性和编程使用 。The following code example demonstrates several declarative and programmatic uses of the class. 该示例创建一个从类继承的自定义编辑器区域 ，并在 Web 部件页中使用它。The example creates a custom editor zone that inherits from the class, and uses it in a Web Parts page. 此代码示例包含三个部分：The code example has three parts: - 使您能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on the Web page. - 引用自定义控件的网页 。A Web page that references the custom control. - 此示例的工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件，该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关显示模式和此控件中的源代码说明的详细信息，请参阅[演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/CS/displaymodecs.ascx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/VB/displaymodevb.ascx#4)] 此代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is a Web page. 页面顶部附近是 `Register` 用户控件的指令。Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive for the user control. 在页面中声明用户控件标记，其中包含 `uc1:` 元素的前缀。The user control tag is declared in the page with a `uc1:` prefix for the element. 请注意，元素下面的 `` `` 元素包含多个 控件，并设置了一些标记和属性来确定其外观和行为。Notice that below the `` element is an `` element that contains several controls, with some tags and properties set to determine its appearance and behavior. 还有很多方法可用于以编程方式访问各个控件的各个成员 。There are also a number of methods that access various members of the control programmatically. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/CS/editorzonecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/VB/editorzonevb.aspx#1)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以在下拉列表中选择 "**编辑模式**" 以切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list to switch to edit mode. 若要显示编辑 UI，可以单击谓词菜单 (两个控件的标题栏中的向下箭头) ，然后单击 "**编辑**" 以编辑控件。To display the editing UI, you can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of one of the two controls, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑 UI 可见后，可以看到声明性和编程方式使用 类成员的效果。With the editing UI visible, you can see the effects of the declarative and programmatic uses of the class members.

para.span: 如果你想要创建自定义 区域来更好地控制编辑 UI 的呈现，则可以直接从类继承，只要 你不需要为页面开发人员提供区域模板支持以 声明方式将控件添加到区域。

span.span: If you want to create a custom zone to gain greater control over the rendering of the editing UI, you can inherit directly from the class, as long as you do not need to provide zone template support for page developers to add controls to your zone declaratively.

para.span: 在这种情况下，您可以 通过编程方式将所有控件添加到区域。

span.span: In such a case, you would add all controls to a zone programmatically.

para.span: 如果要提供区域模板支持，应从 类继承。

span.span: If you want to provide zone template support, you should inherit from the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection CreateEditorParts() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CreateEditorParts () As EditorPartCollection

summary.span: 创建以页持久性格式在区域模板中声明的所有 控件。

span.span: Creates all the controls declared within a zone template in page persistence format.

returns.span: 一个 ，它包含对区域模板中声明的所有 控件的引用。

span.span: An that contains references to all the controls declared within the zone template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会重写基方法，以仅创建在 区域模板中声明的控件。The method overrides the base method to create only the controls that are declared within the zone template. 添加到区域的任何其他控件必须以编程方式添加。Any other controls added to the zone must be added programmatically. 例如，通过在控件中实现接口，可以完成此操作 。This can be done, for example, by implementing the interface in a control. 然后，在重写的 方法中，可以将自定义控件的集合添加 到区域。Then, in the overridden method, you can add a collection of custom controls to a zone.

exception.span: 当前的 控件没有 ID。

span.span: The current control does not have an ID.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.ITemplate ZoneTemplate { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property ZoneTemplate As ITemplate
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ ZoneTemplate { System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ get(); void set(System::Web::UI::ITemplate ^ value); };
member this.ZoneTemplate : System.Web.UI.ITemplate with get, set

summary.span: 提供模板来以页持久性格式包含 控件中的子控件。

span.span: Provides a template to contain child controls within an control in page persistence format.

value.span: 一个 区域模板，作为区域中子控件的容器。

span.span: An zone template that acts as a container for child controls in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是类和基类之间的主要区别 。The property is the key difference between the class and the base class. 通过添加对区域模板的支持， 页面开发人员可以 在网页 的声明性标记中将子控件置于控件中。By adding support for a zone template, the class enables page developers to place child controls within an control in the declarative markup of a Web page. 区域模板充当子控件的容器。The zone template acts as a container for the child controls. > [!NOTE] > 属性的 set 访问器 调用 方法，这 会强制重新创建在模板中声明的控件的集合。The set accessor for the property calls the method, which forces the collection of controls declared in the template to be recreated. 这会导致识别模板内容中的任何更改。This causes any changes in the contents of the template to be recognized. 若要在控件中以声明方式使用区域模板 ，请添加一对 `` 标记，并在 标记之间引用控件。To use a zone template declaratively within an control, you add a pair of `` tags, and reference controls between the tags. 每个控件实例只呈现一个区域模板 (因此，没有理由将多个 `` 元素添加到 控件) 。Only one zone template is rendered per instance of an control (therefore, there is no reason to add multiple `` elements to an control). 此外，控件的区域模板只能 包含从类派生的部件控件 。Also, the zone template of an control can contain only part controls that derive from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了属性的声明性用法 。The following code example demonstrates declarative use of the property. 该示例的完整代码位于类概述的 "示例" 部分 。The full code for the example is found in the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例演示如何 将控件放置在 `` 控件中的元素内 。The code example demonstrates how controls can be placed within a `` element in an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/CS/editorzonecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZone_Overview/VB/editorzonevb.aspx#2)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以在下拉列表中选择 "**编辑模式**" 以切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list to switch to edit mode. 若要显示编辑用户界面 (UI ") ，可以在两个控件之一的标题栏中 (向下箭头) 单击谓词菜单，然后单击"**编辑**"以编辑控件。To display the editing user interface (UI), you can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of one of the two controls, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑 UI 可见后，可以看到在 元素中声明的多个控件 `` 。With the editing UI visible, you can see the several controls that are declared within the `` element.
